Package sprites

Class Powerup

java.lang.Object
sprites.Sprite
sprites.Powerup
public class Powerup
extends Sprite
Author:
Kevin Ren The Powerup class represents a powerup for the game that can be visualized using processing

  • Constructor Details

    • Powerup

      public Powerup​(aviral.shapes.Rectangle s, double vx, double vy, int type)
      creates a powerup object with the specs provided in the parameters
      Parameters:
      s - shape of the powerup
      vx - x velocity of powerup
      vy - y velocity of powerup
      type - type of the powerup
